alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 27 at 10:26PM PDT until March 28 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph. Gusts as high as 70 mph on high peaks and exposed coastal headlands. Gusts closer to 50 mph at lower elevations and more sheltered locations. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Coast County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
